item.title: How To Make Japanese Pickled Ginger
item.author: @huatuostudio
item.description: It’s all over the net at the moment - ginger is the essential healthy power food! I don’t put a lot of ginger in my cooking but I love to eat Japanese pickled ginger from time to time. This is a recipe I’ve been using. The result was great, even mum gave it a thumbs up. Here is the VERY simple recipe on how to make Janpanese pickled ginger: Japanese Pickled Ginger Recipe My pickled ginger.
